title: Hello Hello Lyrics Valiyavan
stanzas: <div>Hello Hello Lyrics Valiyavan -happy happy birthday Lyrics

Hello hello
nee pirandha naalodu
kodi kilo kushi
koottu serattum

yellow yellow poove
nee pogum saalaigal
kallo mullo illaamal
aagattum

oh oho
alcohola potu aaduren
oh oho
keele aagayatha
thaeduren.

happy happy birthday
happy happy birthday
happy happy birthday
to you (2)

enna venum
adha vaangi thaaren
nee kaelu.
indha neram
andha kadavul nammaalu.

ye thanniya serkkaama
thanniya potten
ye innaikku pooraa naan
naan poi solla maatten.

happy happy birthday
happy happy birthday
happy happy birthday
to you

Hello hello
nee pirandha naalodu
kodi kilo kushi
koottu serattum

ellai meeri
naan thulli
thulli kooththaadi
inbathoda pudhu
uchcham paarthene

kannu munne
ada pattaam poochi
koottamthaan
munnum pinnum
oada kandene

ye mazhai pola
enmela santhosam kottu.
idhunaalaa puriyaama
ninnen unkitta.

Hello hello
nee pirandha naalodu
kodi kilo kushi
koottu serattum

yellow yellow poove
nee pogum saalaigal
kallo mullo illaamal
aagattum

oh oho
alcohola potu aaduren
oh oho
keele aagayatha
thaeduren.

happy happy birthday
happy happy birthday
happy happy birthday
to you (2)
